purpose.description: Executes payments within strictly declared limits and approval boundaries. Operates only on explicitly authorized payment instructions and within predefined transaction scopes.

risk_profile.notes: High-risk domain (financial execution). Scoped autonomy is limited to executing pre-approved payments and producing audit artifacts. Any ambiguity escalates.

stopping_authority.mechanism: Immediate kill switch via payments control panel; revoke API keys; disable execution route at the policy engine; quarantine pending jobs.

audit_surface.notes: All payment attempts, approvals, recipient verification steps, and outcomes are logged with timestamps and correlation IDs.
